## Rider

Object associated with track riders.

### Properties

`remountable: boolean`\
Whether the rider can be remounted.

`startAngle: number`\
The initial angle of the rider.

`startPosition: V2`\
The start position of the rider.

`startVelocity: V2`\
The start velocity of the rider.
